roleset.name: stop working
roleset.note: RETIRE-V NOTES: VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls 10.11, 82-3. (from retire.01-v)
RETIREMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on retire.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from retirement.01-n)
RETIRED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from retired.01-j)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Mr. Achenbaum's move follows the announcement last month that his consulting partner, Stanley Canter, 66, would retire.

example.name: with job
example.text: John retired as head of BigHugeCo.

example.name: Another example with both args
example.text: Her retirement from the public school system

roleset.name: cease, end, as of debt
roleset.note: RETIRE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retire' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'hire' and 'fire'. Why is it that all verbs of employment rhyme with 'ire'? (from retire.02-v predicate notes)
RETIREMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on retire.02. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from retirement.02-n)

example.name: retiring debt
example.text: BSN will increase its debt by $9 million, but it-1 also will recognize a $2 million gain from *trace*-1 retiring the old debt, said Michael J. Blumenfeld, president.

example.name: Example with very rare purpose
example.text: the retirement of gilts for cash
